name: Jack my Strap-On
description:
Swapped LA watermelon for FA and threw in the Jackfruit for that tropical mystery vibe. Strap it, then jack it.

Feel free to use FA watermelon like the OG
author: hashslingingslashur

reviews.text: that is super good. fresh tropicalness. good stuff!

This is as smooth and delicious as freshly waxed legs on a bikini model. The LA Watermelon sub works very well in a mouth-watering way and I'm kicking myself for not trying Jackfruit before now. Tropical mystery vibe, indeed! Thanks for this!

A bunch of firsts here for me! This is my first; recipe review, mixing of a strap on and use of jack fruit. I mixed this 5 days ago and have been dripping it anytime i want a smack in the face of tasty, tangy and sweet fruit with a tropical twist! I don't have FA Strawberry, so I subbed CAP sweet strawberry and TFA Strawberry @ 2% each. Thanks for the recipe, and congrats on getting the approval of the heavyweight champ himself! Keep slinging:P
